archdesc.bioghist: Friendly Neighbors Circle of Christian interdenominational service organization supporting various ministries to children, to the aged, the handicapped, to those in hospital, and the underprivileged.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minute books, 1946-2003; membership booklets; treasurer's books, 1979-1992.
